customer.subject: Thank you for contacting Fredonbytes - We'll be in touch soon!
customer.confirmationMessage: We've received your inquiry and will respond within 24 hours.
customer.responseTime: We commit to responding within 24 hours
customer.surveyInvitation: Help us improve! Please take a moment to complete our quick satisfaction survey.

steps.review: Review (within 2 hours): Our team will review your requirements
steps.response: Response (within 24 hours): We'll reach out to discuss your project
steps.consultation: Consultation: Free strategy session to understand your needs
steps.proposal: Proposal: Detailed project proposal and timeline

customer.inTheMeantime: In the meantime, feel free to:
suggestions: Follow us on social media for updates

newsletter.subject: Welcome to Fredonbytes Newsletter!
newsletter.whatToExpect: You're now part of our community and will receive the latest updates, tips, and exclusive offers.

benefits.updates: Latest project updates and case studies
benefits.tips: Expert tips and insights on web development and digital marketing
benefits.offers: Exclusive offers and early access to new services

newsletter.stayTuned: Stay tuned for our next newsletter!
newsletter.unsubscribeInfo: You can unsubscribe at any time by clicking the unsubscribe link in any email.

home.title: Fredonbytes - Your All-in-One IT Powerhouse
home.description: From code to clicks, we deliver complete digital dominance. Full-spectrum IT solutions including software development, graphic design, SEO, and social media marketing.
home.keywords: web development, software development, IT solutions, graphic design, SEO, social media marketing, Brno, Czech Republic

about.title: About Fredonbytes - Your Digital Transformation Partner
about.description: Founded in 2023, Fredonbytes eliminates the need for multiple vendors by becoming your one-stop digital army, ensuring seamless, high-impact results under one roof.
about.keywords: about fredonbytes, digital transformation, IT company, software development team, Brno tech

services.title: IT Services - Software Development, Design & Marketing
services.description: Comprehensive IT solutions from development to marketing. Eliminate complexity with our unified approach to software development, design, SEO, and social media management.
services.keywords: IT services, software development, web development, graphic design, SEO services, social media marketing

projects.title: Our Portfolio - Fredonbytes Project Gallery
projects.description: Explore our latest work and see how we've helped businesses transform their digital presence with cutting-edge solutions.
projects.keywords: portfolio, web development projects, software projects, design showcase, case studies

pricing.title: Transparent Pricing Plans - Choose Your IT Solution
pricing.description: Transparent pricing with no hidden fees. Scale your business with our flexible IT solutions from starter to enterprise plans.
pricing.keywords: pricing, IT services cost, web development pricing, transparent pricing, business plans

contact.title: Contact Fredonbytes - Let's Work Together
contact.description: Ready to transform your digital presence? Contact our team in Brno, Czech Republic for a free consultation on your next IT project.
contact.keywords: contact, Brno IT company, free consultation, project inquiry, Czech Republic tech

links.title: Fredonbytes Links - Connect With Us Everywhere
links.description: All our important links in one place. Connect with Fredonbytes on social media, GitHub, and our various platforms.
links.keywords: social links, GitHub, LinkedIn, contact links, Fredonbytes platforms

privacy-policy.title: Privacy Policy - How We Protect Your Data
privacy-policy.description: Learn how Fredonbytes collects, uses, and protects your personal information. We are committed to maintaining your privacy and data security.
privacy-policy.keywords: privacy policy, data protection, GDPR compliance, personal information, data security

terms-of-service.title: Terms of Service - Fredonbytes Usage Agreement
terms-of-service.description: Terms and conditions for using Fredonbytes services. Understand your rights and obligations when working with our IT solutions.
terms-of-service.keywords: terms of service, usage agreement, service terms, legal terms, conditions

cookie-policy.title: Cookie Policy - How We Use Cookies
cookie-policy.description: Information about how Fredonbytes uses cookies to improve your browsing experience and analyze website usage.
cookie-policy.keywords: cookie policy, website cookies, tracking, analytics, user experience
